page.title: 09A Day in My Life
page.content: Time to get up! Get up! Oh no! I suppose I'll have to go downstairs;go in bathroom,wash,get dressed,have Rice Crispies for breakfast.What's inside the packet? Free comic? No.Transfers. Mum takes me to school.Work.My reading book's called "They Were Brave"; Spellings; now Fletcher Book 2 for my maths. Thursday. Oh good! Swimming. Mrs.Hawkins is my teacher. Line up. When we get there we do breast stroke, back stroke, diving. Back on the bus. Mainline English. Dinnertime - chips, beefburgers and beans. Playtime - tig. I'm on tig. Topic - about canals and how a lock works. P.E. Then Singing. Half past three. Hometime - on the bus. At home, feed rabbits, feed cat, feed dog,take dog for walk, come back, teatime. Get ready for bed, watch television, go to bed.
